item.title: Why It Can Be Cruel to Be Kind in the Workplace
item.author: Andrew Hill
item.description: Source: Why it can be cruel to be kind in the workplace Alongside the predictable specifications for a job vacancy at the Financial Times — problem-solving, tenacity, and so on — is one I haven’t seen before. The ideal candidate must “exude kindness”. As a rule, I would say that if you are actually sweating a quality, you are probably trying too hard. Nobody thinks “he oozes niceness” is a compliment.
